hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x goenvDir=".goenv"
if test ! -d ${goenvDir}; then mkdir -p ${goenvDir}/src/github.com/subutai-io/; fi ln -s ${WORKSPACE} ${WORKSPACE}/${goenvDir}/src/github.com/subutai-io/p2p
export GOPATH=${WORKSPACE}/${goenvDir} export GOBIN=${WORKSPACE}/${goenvDir}/bin export GIT_BRANCH=tag go get go get golang.org/x/sys/windows
./configure --dht=mdht.subut.ai:6881
make all
# get current file id! function jsonval { temp=`echo $json | sed 's/\\\\\//\//g' | sed 's/[{}]//g' | awk -v k="text" '{n=split($0,a,","); for (i=1; i<=n; i++) print a[i]}' | sed 's/\"\:\"/\|/g' | sed 's/[\,]/ /g' | sed 's/\"//g' | grep -w $prop` echo ${temp##*|} }
URL=https://eu0.cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins AUTHID=$(curl -s -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" | gpg --clearsign --no-tty) token=$(curl -s -k -Fmessage="$AUTHID" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token") dir=raw
p2pVersion=$(./p2p -v | cut -d " " -f 3 | tr -d '\n')
filename="p2p" json=`curl -k -s -X GET $URL/raw/info?name=$filename` prop='id' id=`jsonval` curl -s -k -H "token: $token" -Ffile=@$filename -Fversion=$p2pVersion "$URL/$dir/upload" # delete old file curl -s -k -X DELETE "$URL/$dir/delete?id=$id&token=$token"
filename="p2p.exe" json=`curl -k -s -X GET $URL/$dir/info?name=$filename` prop='id' id=`jsonval` curl -s -k -H "token: $token" -Ffile=@$filename -Fversion=$p2pVersion "$URL/$dir/upload" # delete old file curl -s -k -X DELETE "$URL/raw/delete?id=$id&token=$token"
filename="p2p_osx" json=`curl -k -s -X GET $URL/raw/info?name=$filename` prop='id' id=`jsonval` curl -s -k -H "token: $token" -Ffile=@$filename -Fversion=$p2pVersion "$URL/$dir/upload" # delete old file curl -s -k -X DELETE "$URL/raw/delete?id=$id&token=$token"
